typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Kanalnummer = substring(Column_1,1,2),
		Startdatum = substring(Column_1,3,6),
		Startklockslag = substring(Column_1,9,6),
		Slutdatum = substring(Column_1,16,6),
		Slutklockslag = substring(Column_1,23,6),
		{AnvÃ¤nds inte} = substring(Column_1,30,29),
		Kanalreferens = substring(Column_1,59,20),
		Programtitel = substring(Column_1,79,30)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Kanalnummer,
		Startdatum,
		Startklockslag,
		Slutdatum,
		Slutklockslag,
		{AnvÃ¤nds inte},
		Kanalreferens,
		Programtitel
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
